task.title: Installing the client package
task.shortdesc: For the simplest installation experience, install the client package. This package can be installed on Linux, Mac OSX, and Windows. It contains everything that you need to run the DITA-OT except for Java.

ul.li: Ensure that you have Java JRE or JDK, version or later installed.
Ensure that you have HTML Help Workshop installed, if you want to generate HTML Help.

step.cmd: Download the client package from SourceForge.
Extract the contents of the package to the directory where you want to install the DITA-OT.
Add bin directory to PATH system variable.
step.stepresult: This defines the necessary environment variable to run the dita command from the command-line.
